LIST: Integrated SNS accounts’ follower is greater than discovxr’s benchmark.

BUSINESS_CARD.TITLE: Register as business account

LIST.VALUE: User who owns a brand and has items to sell.
User can post auctions, raffles and shoppings withoutadmin’s reviews.

BUSINESS_CARD.INPUT_LABEL: Add brand page url for the review
BUSINESS_CARD.TEXT: Add brand page url for a review. Please integrate with the brand SNS account to prove that you own the brand.

COMPLETE.TITLE: COMPLETE
TEXT: Your account registration has been completed.
Please enjoy shopping and selling on MVMNT.

REGISTER.TERMS: By clicking on the “Next” button you agree to MVMNT’s terms & conditions
